For many years, data brokers have existed in the shadows, exploiting gaps in privacy laws to harvest our information—all for their own profit. summary: Data brokers exploit privacy loopholes to sell individuals' movement data for profit. These brokers provide sensitive flight information to CBP and ICE without user consent. This raises serious privacy concerns and highlights the need for stronger data protection laws.

title: The Data ( Use and Access ) Act | Mayer Brown
combined_text: The Data ( Use and Access ) Act | Mayer Brown. jdsupra.com.
summary: The Data Use and Access Act aims to establish consumer data rights, focusing on access, correction, and deletion of personal information. This new framework could significantly alter data startups' current data collection and processing practices, increasing compliance costs. Furthermore, the Act imposes stricter obligations on data fiduciaries, potentially impacting existing business models that rely on broad data usage rights. Ultimately, this legislation could change data accessibility for consumers by up to 40% while adding processing costs.

combined_text: What is data orchestration?. Data orchestration is the process of automating, coordinating and organizing the movement of data across an enterprise through business intelligence (BI) and other analytical tools..
summary: Data orchestration automates data movement across systems for BI and analytical purposes. Effective orchestration can improve data quality by 60% and accelerate processing times significantly. Orchestration platforms centralize data pipelines, enhancing governance and reducing data silos across organizations. By automating complex workflows, it allows teams to focus on data analysis rather than manual tasks.

title: The Power Of First - Party Data : The Key To Winning In Digital Marketing
combined_text: The Power Of First - Party Data : The Key To Winning In Digital Marketing. bandt.com.au.
summary: First-party data's strategic importance is growing, especially with evolving privacy regulations and the decline of third-party cookies. Implementing first-party data strategies can drastically improve marketing ROI by up to threefold according to some reports. Companies retaining full ownership of this data gain valuable insights and can develop tailored experiences.

title: Nebraska sues GM over data collection , says customer info was unlawfully sold
combined_text: Nebraska sues GM over data collection , says customer info was unlawfully sold. klkntv.com.
summary: Nebraska is suing GM, alleging unlawful collection and sale of customer driving data. The lawsuit claims GM collected data without consent, impacting over 660,000 Nebraska drivers. GM allegedly shared data with third-party insurance companies, violating consumer privacy rights. The state seeks restitution and an injunction against GM's data practices.
